school: Mech & Mine Engineering School, Sustainable Minerals Institute, Mech & Mine Engineering School, Sustainable Minerals Institute
description: Project or thesis on a topic approved by the Head of School. Students commencing course in sem 1 enrol in MINE7009 for sem 1 and sem 2; students commencing in sem 2 enrol in MINE7029 for sem 2 and the following sem 1.
